home.steps_desc: From Idea to Live in 7 Simple Steps
home.visual_intelligence_desc: Stop writing boilerplate. FlowCode understands your intent and builds architecture instantly.
home.cognitive_load_desc: Forget syntax errors. The IDE handles syntax, you focus on logic.
home.philosophy_quote:
"Don't obsess over syntax, focus on creativity.
Let AI be your executor, you just be the decision maker."

features.title: Break the Boundaries
features.subtitle: We understand the hesitation of starting from zero. At FlowCode, these former obstacles become your steps to evolution.
features.card1_desc: In an AI world, you don't need to memorize rigid syntax. FlowCode understands your intent; it builds stable architecture while you focus on 'What'. Let creativity flow; let logic handle the rest.
features.card2_desc: You don't need a perfect blueprint at the start. AI captures your most intuitive impulses and gradually outlines the details. One spark of inspiration is all it takes to ignite your project.
features.card3_desc: Discard tedious traditional configurations. With natural language interaction, stable Google sync, and zero-cost Cloudflare deployment, complexity is hidden so your creativity can stretch freely.
features.vision_quote_1: I hope everyone can use AI to do what they love.
features.vision_quote_2: This is the last era of traditional coding,
features.vision_quote_highlight: and the first era of AI creation.
features.vision_desc: A perfect AI workflow makes your dreams easier to realize than you imagine. Join history.
